data.lyric:
[ti:Worth It]
[ar:YK Osiris]
[al:Worth It]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Worth It - YK Osiris
[00:01.28]Lyrics by：Osiris Williams/Caleb Hedberg/Melvin Goggins Jr/Orlando Woods, Jr./Danny Snodgrass, Jr./Kim Candilora/Travis Mills
[00:02.56]Composed by：Osiris Williams/Caleb Hedberg/Melvin Goggins Jr/Orlando Woods, Jr./Danny Snodgrass, Jr./Kim Candilora/Travis Mills
[00:03.84]I would give you the world nah nah nah
[00:10.87]You just gotta be worth it yeah yeah yeah yeah
[00:15.51]I would give you the world baby girl
[00:18.51]You just gotta be worth it oh oh oh
[00:22.54]You don't gotta be perfect mmh mmh mmh
[00:26.34]You just gotta be worth it yeah yeah yeah yeah
[00:30.97]I would give you the world baby girl
[00:34.11]You just gotta be worth it yeah yeah
[00:37.77]But you don't gotta be perfect oh oh oh
[00:41.81]You just gotta be worth it yeah yeah yeah nah nah
[00:47.15]Everybody doubted me but girl you stuck around
[00:51.06]And you told me if I hold you you gon' hold me down
[00:54.87]You don't gotta be perfect you just gotta be worth it
[00:58.78]Buyin' this and that baby girl you don't ever have to work again
[01:02.77]Time is precious baby girl let's not let it go by
[01:06.66]I just really wanna know do you love me don't lie
[01:10.36]I know you felt alone huh 'cause I been on the road huh
[01:14.17]But I been doin' shows I swear I ain't doin' you wrong
[01:17.57]Ridin' 'round through the city yeah
[01:19.60]Girl you know you comin' with me yeah
[01:21.32]I been a hundred out of fifty girl
[01:23.26]Ain't nobody messin' with me yeah
[01:25.26]I don't really think they understand
[01:27.28]Baby girl I know you understand
[01:29.10]I'm just tryna go feed my fam hey-ey-ey nah
[01:32.96]I would give you the world baby girl
[01:36.02]You just gotta be worth it oh oh oh
[01:39.90]You don't gotta be perfect mmh mmh mmh
[01:43.91]You just gotta be worth it yeah yeah yeah yeah
[01:48.40]I would give you the world baby girl
[01:51.27]You just gotta be worth it yeah yeah
[01:55.33]But you don't gotta be perfect oh oh oh
[01:59.29]You just gotta be worth it yeah yeah yeah nah nah
[02:19.76]Oh-whoa whoa nah nah nah
[02:30.56]Nah nah nah
[02:34.88]I would give you the world baby girl
[02:37.88]You just gotta be worth it oh oh oh
[02:41.81]You don't gotta be perfect mmh mmh mmh
[02:45.72]You just gotta be worth it yeah yeah yeah yeah
[02:50.42]I would give you the world baby girl
[02:53.46]You just gotta be worth it yeah yeah
[02:57.09]But you don't gotta be perfect oh oh oh
[03:01.15]You just gotta be worth it yeah yeah yeah nah nah

[ti:Worth It]
[ar:YK Osiris]
[al:Worth It]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.28]//
[00:02.56]//
[00:03.84]我会把一切都给你
[00:10.87]你值得拥有这一切
[00:15.51]我会把一切都给你 亲爱的女孩
[00:18.51]你值得拥有这一切
[00:22.54]你不需要太完美
[00:26.34]你值得拥有这一切
[00:30.97]我会把一切都给你 亲爱的女孩
[00:34.11]你值得拥有这一切
[00:37.77]但你不需要太完美
[00:41.81]你值得拥有这一切
[00:47.15]大家都质疑我 女孩 只有你留在我身边
[00:51.06]你对我说 只要我伸出手 你就会紧紧抱着我
[00:54.87]你不需要太完美 你值得拥有这一切
[00:58.78]想买什么都可以 女孩 你不用工作赚钱了
[01:02.77]春宵苦短 亲爱的女孩 我们得好好珍惜
[01:06.66]我只想知道 你真的爱我吗 不要骗我
[01:10.36]我知道你很孤独 因为我总是在外奔波
[01:14.17]但我一直在演出 我发誓 我没有做对不起你的事
[01:17.57]开着车穿越这个城市
[01:19.60]女孩 你知道你会一直陪着我
[01:21.32]我可是那种难得一遇的人 女孩
[01:23.26]没有人敢惹我
[01:25.26]我想他们还是不明白
[01:27.28]亲爱的女孩 我知道你懂
[01:29.10]我只是想养活我的家人
[01:32.96]我会把一切都给你 亲爱的女孩
[01:36.02]你值得拥有这一切
[01:39.90]你不需要太完美
[01:43.91]你值得拥有这一切
[01:48.40]我会把一切都给你 亲爱的女孩
[01:51.27]你值得拥有这一切
[01:55.33]但你不需要太完美
[01:59.29]你值得拥有这一切
